pr_title: Removes redundant DateTimeFormatter cache in DateTimeHandler

timeline.message:
Removes redundant DateTimeFormatter cache in DateTimeHandler

Follow up to #5326

Since jodatime has its own built-in cache, no need to keep one in our system.

Also simplifies the logic around using InbuiltFunctionRegistry so that all usage is static
now that no cache is necessary. This removes the need for the FunctionRegistryFactory too.

Removes redundant DateTimeFormatter cache in DateTimeHandler

Follow up to #5326

Since jodatime has its own built-in cache, no need to keep one in our system.

Also simplifies the logic around using InbuiltFunctionRegistry so that all usage is static
now that no cache is necessary. This removes the need for the FunctionRegistryFactory too.

timeline.bodyText: I feel this FunctionRegistry should be in pinot-common module, so we  can leverage it during query compilation phase.
timeline.author: xiangfu0
